metadata.feature_description: Validates resource files and localization support

steps.action: Logged in as SuperUser and navigated to home page
steps.expected: PersonaBar should display localized menu item text 'Accounts'
steps.actual: PersonaBar displays 'nav_Accounts' instead of 'Accounts' - resource key is shown instead of localized value

steps.action: Inspected PersonaBar DOM structure for Accounts menu item
steps.expected: Menu item should have localized text from resource file
steps.actual: DOM shows generic element with text 'nav_Accounts' - resource file value is not being applied

steps.action: Hovered over Accounts menu item to check tooltip/label
steps.expected: Should display 'Accounts' as tooltip or label
steps.actual: Text element shows 'nav_Accounts' - localization framework not loading resource correctly

issues: Resource file (AccountSettings.resx) contains 'nav_AccountSettings.Text' = 'Accounts' but UI shows 'nav_Accounts'
Mismatch between resource key in file ('nav_AccountSettings.Text') and key used by UI ('nav_Accounts')
Localization framework not properly resolving the resource key

steps.action: Reviewed resource file AccountSettings.resx in codebase
steps.expected: Resource file should contain nav_AccountSettings.Text with value 'Accounts'
steps.actual: Resource file contains correct key-value pair: nav_AccountSettings.Text = 'Accounts'

steps.action: Checked PersonaBar UI for rendered Accounts menu text
steps.actual: UI displays 'nav_Accounts' which appears to be a different resource key pattern, not the resolved value

issues: Resource key mismatch: File has 'nav_AccountSettings.Text' but UI appears to use 'nav_Accounts'
The value 'Accounts' from the resource file is never displayed in the UI
Possible configuration issue in PersonaBar menu registration

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Check module icon file exists and displays

steps.expected: Module icon file should exist in images folder

steps.action: Inspected PersonaBar for Accounts menu icon
steps.expected: An icon should be displayed for the Accounts menu item
steps.actual: A user profile silhouette icon IS displayed in the PersonaBar for the Accounts area. Note: The displayed icon (user profile) differs from the module_icon_32x32.png file (document/edit icon), suggesting PersonaBar uses a different icon set

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Test localization in different languages if available

steps.action: Checked codebase for language-specific resource files
steps.actual: No language-specific resource files exist - only the default AccountSettings.resx file

steps.expected: PersonaBar menu should update with Spanish translations if available
steps.actual: Page URL changed to /es-ar/ but PersonaBar still shows 'nav_Accounts' (not translated)

steps.action: Verified Accounts menu text in Spanish locale
steps.expected: Should show Spanish translation or at least the default 'Accounts' text
steps.actual: DOM confirms 'nav_Accounts' is still displayed - no localization occurring even with default resource

issues: No language-specific resource files provided for AccountSettings module
Default English resource is not being applied in any language
Localization infrastructure appears to be misconfigured for this module

observations: The resource file AccountSettings.resx exists and contains valid key-value pairs (nav_AccountSettings.Text = 'Accounts')
The PersonaBar UI displays 'nav_Accounts' which appears to be a resource key reference that is not being resolved
There is a mismatch between the resource key in the file ('nav_AccountSettings.Text') and what the UI appears to be looking for ('nav_Accounts')
The module icon file (module_icon_32x32.png) is a document/edit icon, but the PersonaBar displays a user profile silhouette icon - likely using a different icon source
No localized versions of the resource file exist for other languages (es-AR, de-DE, fr-FR, ar-ER)
The localization framework appears to be failing to load or apply the resource strings for this module
